A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sorry but this movie has so much wrong with it that I don't think I cover it all. First of all\, what they do to the character of Luke Skywalker is outrageous. The whole casino sub plot is a complete waste of time that goes nowhere. Rey defeats a fully trained Jedi Master as well as a force user trained by him without almost any training at all. It makes no sense\, and neither does the whole rest of the movie. As much as I love Star Wars\, I'm strongly considering boycotting the future movies until this is fixed if it's fixed at all. So many childhood memories ruined in one foul swoop.
